short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically share your Privacy Choices & ad targeting preferences on each website you browse.
short.fr: Partagez automatiquement vos choix de confidentialité et vos préférences de ciblage publicitaire sur chaque site web que vous…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ID Side offers a groundbreaking solution to a problem we all face online: managing cookie banners and privacy preferences. Powered by AI, ID Side automates the filling of cookie banners across websites, allowing users to define, control, and share their privacy choices effortlessly, ensuring their preferences are consistently respected.

Why Choose ID Side?
- 100% Cookie Banner Automation: Say goodbye to tedious cookie banners! ID Side automatically fills out up to 80% of cookie consent forms on Safari, with plans to reach 100% across all browsers. This drastically reduces time wasted on repetitive tasks and eliminates "consent fatigue."

- True Control of Online Privacy: With ID Side, you can set your preferences for data tracking and privacy once, and our AI ensures those settings are applied wherever you browse. This empowers users with real control over their online experience without the hassle of manually adjusting settings on every site.

- AI-Powered Consent Management: Our AI continuously updates and adapts to evolving cookie banner formats across the web, ensuring the highest level of accuracy and reliability. As websites update, our AI learns to keep your consent preferences intact without manual intervention.

- Effortless and Time-Saving: Imagine being able to skip the hassle of cookie banners on every site you visit. With ID Side, you no longer have to manually accept or reject cookies repeatedly, saving time and effort.

- Security and Privacy First: Founded by experts in data protection and digital law, ID Side is designed with user privacy at its core. Your data is never sold or shared with third parties, and the service is centered on empowering users with control over their own information.

- Comprehensive Solution for All: Whether you’re an individual looking for simple privacy settings or a business aiming to streamline consent management, ID Side offers a scalable, multi-platform solution. It’s currently available on Safari, with Chrome support coming soon.

Join over 5000 users who are already experiencing the benefits of automatic consent management. Download ID Side today and take back control of your online privacy with ease.
